t: General Mills - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - General Mills, Inc. is an American multinational manufacturer and marketer of branded processed consumer foods sold through retail stores. Founded on the banks of the Mississippi River at Saint Anthony Falls in Minneapolis, the company originally gained fame for being a large flour miller.

t: General Mills, Inc. | Food Manufacturer, Cereal Maker, Snack Producer | Britannica Money
s: It sold off a number of unprofitable flour mills and moved into such areas as snack foods, children’s toys and games, and fashion. By the mid-1980s, however, the company began selling off many of the nonfood units it had acquired in the ’60s.
